briefdescription.para: Height of bounding box for drawing.
Width of bounding box for drawing.
Default angle for drawing arrow heads.
Maximum radius for pattern (analogous to the Ewald sphere).
Number of possible input files to be simultaneously rendered in the drawing.
The maximum number of allowed super-structure domains per substrate pattern.
Indicates output format of generated LEED pattern.
Indicates color scheme for LEED pattern.
